title: Parameters for Traffic Light Map Based Detector

max_vibration_pitch.description: Maximum error in pitch direction. If -5~+5, it will be 10.

max_vibration_yaw.description: Maximum error in yaw direction. If -5~+5, it will be 10.

max_vibration_height.description: Maximum error in height direction. If -5~+5, it will be 10.

max_vibration_width.description: Maximum error in width direction. If -5~+5, it will be 10.

max_vibration_depth.description: Maximum error in depth direction. If -5~+5, it will be 10.

max_detection_range.description: Maximum detection range in meters. Must be positive

min_timestamp_offset.description: Minimum timestamp offset when searching for corresponding tf

max_timestamp_offset.description: Maximum timestamp offset when searching for corresponding tf

timestamp_sample_len.description: sampling length between min_timestamp_offset and max_timestamp_offset
